events.body:
LLM spam detection (✨ experimental): SPAM. The post reads like unsolicited promotion/self-published material (includes an attached PDF and multiple user mentions) rather than a focused bug report, feature request, or constructive discussion about the project. It makes broad promotional claims and personal attribution, lacks actionable details or relevance to a code issue, and appears intended to advertise an external viewpoint/service.

♻️ Automatically wiping, closing, and locking for now based on heuristics.
Generally, please focus on creating high-quality, original content that demonstrates a clear
understanding of the project's requirements and goals.

rename.from: Maximum Bitcoin price based on LAEV
